Header: Foreign nationals hold up Matara fuel station (CCTV footage)
Content: A police investigation is underway after a fuel station in Akuressa, Matara was allegedly robbed by two foreigners. The foreigners had allegedly walked into the fuel station under the guise of customers at around 3.00 pm on Monday. Our reporter reveals that after purchasing items from the station the suspects had robbed money and fled the scene in a three-wheeler. Subsequent, to the robbery the suspects are believed to have headed to Mirissa area, according to our reporter. Newsfirst has received the CCTV footage of the incident, that was recorded at the time of the robbery.
